content: दारुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दॄ-णिच्-उनन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 53</ls>] {@--1@} {1} Hard, rough; <ls>U. 3. 34.</ls> {@--2@} Harsh, cruel, ruthless, pitiless; मय्येव विस्मरणदारुणचित्तवृत्तौ <ls>Ś. 5. 23</ls>; पशुमारणकर्मदारुणः <ls n="Ś.">6. 1</ls>; दारुणरसः ‘of cruel resolve or nature’ <ls>U. 5. 19</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 270.</ls> {@--3@} Fierce, terrible, frightful; <ls>Ś. 6. 28.</ls> {@--4@} Heavy, violent, intense, poignant, agonizing (grief, pain &c.); हृदयकुसुमशोषी दारुणो दीर्घशोकः <ls>U. 3. 5.</ls> {@--5@} Sharp, severe (as words). {@--6@} Atrocious, shocking. --णः {@--1@} The sentiment of horror (भयानक). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --णं Severity, cruelty, horror, &c.
